Name: Guard Claw
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Anorith and Armaldo.  Finding a Guard Claw at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
